name: Splitwiser
work: Built a clone of Splitwise, and added receipt scanning using camera or file upload, graphical split functionality, manual split functionality, groups addition and non-group expenses functionality
Integrated Google Gemini API to convert receipts to JSON, used NextJS and Google firebase for app development

name: LLM Based Chatbot
work: Developed a chatbot application by integrating Llama model, including RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to provide context-aware user interactions
Deployed the application on AWS EC2, utilizing AWS Bedrock API for integrating LLM, ensuring scalability and performance
tech_used: NextJS, Amazon Bedrock, Amazon EC2, Firebase

name: Skin Cancer Detection
work: Engineered a Skin Cancer Detection model employing Convolutional Neural Networks from Tensorflow Keras
Implemented four convolutional layers, with filters ranging from 32 to 128, used Softmax activation for distributing output among 11 classes, deployed ADAM optimizer with augmentation
Attained an accuracy of 93% on a dataset comprising over 25000 images covering eight cancer types

name: Out-of-Order APEX Processor Simulator
work: Implemented a simulator for an out-of-order processor implementing an APEX-like ISA with an issue queue, load-store queue and reorder buffer that uses register renaming
Executed register renaming with 16 architectural and 25 physical registers, register forwarding, tag broadcasting and instruction branching
Successfully implemented a 6-stage APEX ISA pipeline with speculative execution with execution depth of 4

name: Autocorrect using Textdistance
work: Fabricated an autocorrect application that recommends three closest words to the entered word
Employed Python scripting and Textdistance API, and consolidated a UI using Angular to visualize the API
Deployed the Flask API service on Render

name: Reddit Data Sentiment Analysis
work: Developed a scheduled data collection system to collect post related information from Reddit platform related to the India-Canada feud, performed data analysis and displayed the results in a web-based UI
Leveraged Angular and Flask framework and performed hate-speech analysis using ModerateHateSpeech API
Collected real-time data using Python scripts and Reddit developer API by scheduling the system using Crontab
Produced over 350 word-clouds, 15 sentiment analysis graphs and a data collection trend graph

name: Digit Recognizer
work: Designed a 11-stage CNN to recognize handwritten digits
Trained the model with 42000 images and tested the model with 28000 images with 92% accuracy
